dict.acceptation: 螺丝钉；螺旋桨，螺旋状物；（螺丝的）转，扭；吝啬鬼；
用螺丝拧紧；扭曲（某人的面孔）；〈俚〉占便宜，诈骗；
扭转，扭歪；旋紧；（和某人）性交；

sent.orig: Spectacle screw, T filling piece, wristwatch screw, handset screw, miniature nut, dentistry root canal pile.
sent.trans: 眼镜螺丝，T型垫片，手表螺丝，手机螺丝，微型螺母，牙科根管桩。

sent.orig: Bolt Screw Series, Nuts Series, Plug screw, Non-standard parts, stainless steel. Ningbo DONGFANG stainless screw factory.
sent.trans: 东方不锈钢螺钉，螺母，螺帽，堵头油塞，非标件加工，宁波市北仑区大矸东方不锈钢镙钉厂。

sent.orig: The screw of twin-screw plastic extruder is complex, its structure and parameters determine extrusion process.
sent.trans: 双螺杆塑料挤出机中的螺杆较为复杂，螺杆的结构和参数对挤出过程起决定作用。

sent.orig: In an embodiment, the apparatus includes a screw, the sleeve being adapted to slidably the screw.
sent.trans: 在一个实施例中，该设备包括一个螺钉，该套管适合于可以滑动地装入该螺钉。

sent.orig: Loosen screw of pointer on indicating dial, set pointer pointing to "CL0SE", then fix screw.
sent.trans: 松开开度指示盘上的指针螺钉，使指针与刻度盘上的“关”对齐，再将螺钉拧紧。
